channel.title: Github on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Deuts Log

item.title: Building an Efficient Blogging Workflow with Hugo, Obsidian, and GitHub Pages
item.description: Exploring Hugo, Obsidian and Github Pages as a flexible and efficient blogging setup, focusing on low dependency and high control, with a look at potential WordPress migration challenges.

item.title: Setting Up a Git Repository for Pushing to GitHub
item.description: Set up a Git repository with main as the initial branch, link it to GitHub with a custom remote (not origin), and authenticate using GitHubâ€™s Personal Access Token (PAT). This guide covers staging, committing, and pushing files securely and efficiently, so you can use common Git commands without repeatedly specifying a remote.
